org.kiji.schema.util
Class JsonEntityIdParser

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.schema.util.JsonEntityIdParser

@ApiAudience.Framework
@ApiStability.Evolving
public final class JsonEntityIdParser
extends Object

Container class for entity ids which can be backed as strings (suitable for raw, hashed, hash-prefixed, and materialization suppressed keys) xor as a list of components (suitable for formatted entity ids without materialization unsuppresed).

Method Detail

create

public static JsonEntityIdParser create(String entityId,
                                        KijiTableLayout layout)
                                 throws IOException
Create JsonEntityIdParser from a string input, which can be a json string or a raw hbase rowKey. This method is used for entity ids specified from the URL.

Parameters:
entityId - string of the row.
layout - of the table in which the entity id belongs. If null, then long components may not be recognized.
Returns:
a properly constructed JsonEntityIdParser.
Throws:
IOException - if JsonEntityIdParser can not be properly constructed.

create

public static JsonEntityIdParser create(EntityId entityId,
                                        KijiTableLayout layout)
                                 throws IOException
Create JsonEntityIdParser from entity id and layout.

Parameters:
entityId - of the row.
layout - of the table containing the row.
Returns:
a properly constructed JsonEntityIdParser.
Throws:
IOException - if JsonEntityIdParser can not be properly constructed.

create

public static JsonEntityIdParser create(org.codehaus.jackson.JsonNode node,
                                        KijiTableLayout layout)
                                 throws IOException
Create JsonEntityIdParser from a JSON node.

Parameters:
node - is the JSON representation of the formatted entity_id.
layout - of the table in which the entity id belongs. If null, then long components may not be recognized.
Returns:
a properly constructed JsonEntityIdParser.
Throws:
IOException - if JsonEntityIdParser can not be properly constructed.

Gets the array of components.

array of components.

isWildcarded

public boolean isWildcarded()
Are any of the components wildcarded...

Returns:
true iff at least one component is a wildcard (indicated by a null).

getJsonEntityId

public org.codehaus.jackson.JsonNode getJsonEntityId()
Gets the json node eid (which can be null if the eid was backed as a string).

Returns:
json node of the eid.

public String getStringEntityId()
Gets the string representation of the eid.

hasComponents

public boolean hasComponents()
If the eid backed by a json or a string?

Returns:
true iff eid is backed by json node.

getEntityId

public EntityId getEntityId()
                     throws IOException
Construct eid from a entity id string. Formatted entity ids mustn't have wildcards in order to resolve.

Returns:
the eid.
Throws:
IOException - if construction of eid fails due to incorrect user input.
